item.title: Hands on Github Practice
item.description: Hands on Github Practice This session is focused on implementing agile methodology in a Github and Zenhub environment. For that, the session will initialy make an introduction to Github and Zenhub, explaining main complementarities and key elementos for efficient code development. Moreover, the methodology will be implemented in an example based on creating some markdown documents. Session documentation Theory
